description: The game has a good old-fashioned shoot-em-up style, but with a bullet-hell element and the ability to aim safely for a high score the more you attack. It is a game that combines the good old shoot-em-up shooter style with a bullet barrage element and a novel system where the more you attack, the safer you are and the higher score you can aim for. In addition, the game is also equipped with attractive characters created by Akio Watanabe and the unit "Kota Takahashi" created by Kenji Ito and Kota Takahashi. In addition, the attractive characters created by Akio Watanabe and the sound by Kenji Ito and Kota Takahashi's unit "RESONATOR The game is also enhanced by attractive characters created by Akio Watanabe and sound by Kenji Ito and Kota Takahashi's unit "Resonator.
name: Bullet Soul
